column16:
Use #T8_hei
to share tech about this character on Twitter

column8: Resurrected King of Iron Fist  by Applay
column12: EWGF ⏵ f+3 ⏵ df+1 ⏵ f+3~D FUJ.2 ⏵ f,n,d,df+4,3

column2:
Can perform EWGF and OTGF without perfect input 
Gains access to uf+4,1 ― d+3,2 and b+3,3,2 
Gains access to a new power crush in db+1+2 
FUJ stance gains reversal properties
column7:
_Useful for block and whiff punishment. Can also be used 
 in combos.

column12: EWGF ⏵ f+3~D (df) 4,4,1 ⏵ f+3~D FUJ.2 T! ⏵ f,n,d,df+4,3

column7:
Safe mid attack for approach, also useful as a punish 
 in specific cases.

column12: (dash) EWGF ⏵ f+3 ⏵ df+1 ⏵ f+3~D FUJ.2 ⏵ f,n,d,df+4,3

column7: Good whiff punisher, especially when Heat is active.
_Has sabaki properties, great defensive tool.

column2:
Gain a stack each time you activate Heat 
Warrior Instinct is available after 3 stacks ― press 1+4
column7:
_Heat Engager from stance. Mostly useful as a guaranteed 
_follow-up after f+3~D on hit.

Fast attack to start offense and check situations.
 Both 1,1 and 1,b+2 are great extensions for poking.

Mid attack to check situations.
 df+1,1 can be used to check sidestepping opponents
 while df+1:2 can be charged and is useful for pressure.
column12: (dash) EWGF ⏵ f+3 ⏵ df+1 ⏵ f+3~D FUJ.2 ⏵ f,n,d,df+4,3

column7:
Useful button to pressure opponents at the wall.
 It allows you some follow-ups on counterhit and when it 
 hits crouching opponents. 
 You can shift to FUJ stance by pressing down.
Your main tool to fish for counterhits. Careful not to whiff.
column12: f,n,d,df+4,n,4 ⏵ f+3 ⏵ df+1 ⏵ f+3~D FUJ.2 ⏵ f,n,d,df+4,3

column7: A risky launcher that is useful to hit grounded opponents.
column12:
EWGF ⏵ 1 ⏵ df+1 ⏵ f+3~D  DF+4,4,1 ⏵ f+3~D FUJ.2 T!
⏵ sidestep.2~F 1

column7:
Long range mid that can shift to FUJ stance. 
 It doesn't give you advantage on block, so it's a good idea 
 to cancel the stance by pressing DF~B if you don't wanna 
 gamble with a stance option.
Low options to chip at the opponent's health.
column11: Alternative input df+3,1+2,qcf+1 deals more damage

column7:
Heihachi's hellsweep has many different follow-ups
 The single hit is a good button to pressure opponents and
 leads to a combo on counterhit.

_A high launching attack with many applications in the neutral 
 It's important for punishment, but can be used for approach 
 and as a keepout button. Don't neglect it.

column12: After T!, b:2 (perfect) ⏵ micro dash ⏵ Heat Burst ⏵ ender
b:2 (perfect) for short distance, b+1,4 and f,n,d,df+4,3 for long

column6:
EWGF speed depends on player's execution
It can punish -13 moves, but is more practical against -15 attacks
column12: End with qcf+2 to break walls and d+3 to break floor
Warrior (1),b+2,2 guarantees an OTGF or d+3 as follow-up

column7: STANDING

column2:
heat on qcf+2~F
heat on b+1+2~F
